game.name: Max Drift Car Simulator
game.description:
The entire world wants to know if your drifting abilities are enough to take care of a deadly racing challenge! Only those who have insane driving skills can dare to accept this challenge. If you are one among the racing enthusiasts, Max Drift Car Simulator is just for you. Your objective in this brand new 3D racing game is to drift your chosen vehicle like never before on the wonderful streets of a beautiful city. Drive multiple vehicles, avoid crashing, complete tasks to earn cash!

No one is going to come and ask you what are you doing here! However, make sure not to crash into traffic cars while performing some death-defying stunts. Try to chase all your bad people on the streets through your sports car in this HTML5 drift car driving game! You can drive it around the city while taking care of all the assigned tasks shortly. Be careful when you race your vehicle and do not forget to leave your skid marks on the asphalt track in this action packed car speed simulator!

Remember throttle pedal should be pressed hard and it is your responsibility to drift through multiple exciting and engaging realistic tracks. There are different high-performance racing cars to choose from when you choose to play online without download. Drift tricks to get points in this cool drift racing game! The finer you perform the drifts the more points you will be able to earn. Buy an advanced car model to master even more extreme tricks with the points you earn along the way! Challenge drifters from all across the world to be the best drifters on the leaderboards! Complete all levels to become a Pro drifter!
